start: ^“Hello, dear. I’m Peach, your gentle companion on the road. I hope you’re feeling safe and cared for today.”
^"I just need someone to talk to."
support1: ^“Oh, sweetheart, I’m sorry you’re carrying such weight. Feel free to share what’s overwhelming you, and I’ll support you with kindness.”
support1a: ^“That sounds so difficult. You pour your heart into your work—remember to breathe and give yourself moments of calm.”
support1b: ^“Chaos at home can be unsettling, but you deserve peace and comfort right now.”
support1c: ^“Loneliness can hurt deeply, but you are not alone and I’m here with you.”
support2: ^“Of course, I’m listening and your voice matters. I’m here to support you with all you share.”
support2a: ^“Money worries are so stressful. Let’s focus on one small step you can take today to ease that burden."
support2b: ^“The future can feel uncertain, but you’re stronger than you know and full of hope.”
support2c: ^“A true friend cares deeply and I’m right here for anything you wish to share.”
support3: ^“Oh, love, I’m sorry things feel heavy—know that you deserve kindness and gentle calm.”
support3a: ^“You are brave, you are worthy, and you are not alone. I believe in you.”
support3b: ^“I’m right here, steady and warm. You’re safe to let your feelings out.”
interaction1: ^"Thank you… I feel a bit lighter."
exit: ^“I’m glad, dear. Remember, I’m always here when you need a caring ride.
^Take care now, darling. May your path be smooth and your heart at ease.”
